code: import axios from"axios";import{GET_AUTHOR,AUTHORS_LOADING}from"./types";export var getAuthor=function getAuthor(id){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setAuthorsLoading());axios.get("/api/authors/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_AUTHOR,payload:res.data});});};};export var setAuthorsLoading=function setAuthorsLoading(){return{type:AUTHORS_LOADING};};
